item.title: Adding quest requirment on quest cape
item.dc:creator: @RuneX-Gaming RuneX-Gaming
item.description:
@RuneX-Gaming wrote:

Is there any way to add all quests complete requirement on delta source.

Quests are defined on my server as, for example, q1 = 15, for quest 1 complete.

Thanks for your time,

  • RuneX -[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2009, 09:09:26 am[/size][hr]I was thinking of somthing like;

if (ItemName.startsWith("Quest")) { return q1 = 15; return q2 = 15; return q3 = 15; return q4 = 15; }

  • RuneX -
